verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Oh, now I see the crimson wave! The fountain deep and wide; Jesus, my Lord, mighty to save, Points to His wounded side.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: The cleansing stream I see, I see! I plunge, and, oh, it cleanseth me! Oh, praise the Lord, it cleanseth me! It cleanseth me, yes, cleanseth me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I see the new creation rise, I hear the speaking blood; It speaks, polluted nature dies, Sinks ’neath the cleansing flood.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I rise to walk in Heav’n’s own light, Above the world and sin, With heart made pure and garments white, And Christ enthroned within.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Amazing grace! ’tis Heav’n below To feel the blood applied, And Jesus, only Jesus know, My Jesus crucified.
